short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for extracting tags specifically anchor href's and img src tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This utility serves to extract image "src" values as well as anchor "href" values to a list. It is designed to compliment Wget and other utilities which download items. Some sites load images dynamically after the page is rendered and it makes it difficult to extract files without utilizing a browser. This extension attempts to solve this issue through extracting the tags after the script on the page has loaded.
